member.name: T:Sudoku.CodeGen.Deconstruction.Annotations.AutoDeconstructAttribute
member.summary: To mark on a , or a , to describe this type is deconstructable.
member.remarks: Please note that all s have already contained a deconstruction method that deconstruct all members declared in the primary constructor.

member.name: M:Sudoku.CodeGen.Deconstruction.Annotations.AutoDeconstructAttribute.#ctor(System.String[])

member.name: P:Sudoku.CodeGen.Deconstruction.Annotations.AutoDeconstructAttribute.FieldsOrProperties
member.summary: Indicates the field or property names of this type to deconstruct.
